DOC.brief_summary: Before and during bariatric surgery patients are given oral and i.v. midazolam, respectively and blood samples are drawn to establish midazolam time-concentration profiles. After 0.5-2 years, and substantial weight loss, oral and i.v. midazolam are administered once more and blood samples are taken again.
DOC.brief_title: CYP3A4 Metabolism Before and After Surgery Induced Weight Loss Using Midazolam as Model Drug
DOC.criteria: BMI>40 undergoing bariatric surgery use of drug inducing or inhibiting CYP3A4 activity pregnancy, breastfeeding renl insufficiency
